00022 template<typename eglue_type>
00023 struct eglue_core
00024   {
00025   
00026   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_inline static typename T1::elem_type get_elem(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x, const u32 i);
00027   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_inline static typename T1::elem_type get_elem(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x, const u32 row, const u32 col);
00028   
00029   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_inline static void apply(Mat<typename T1::elem_type>& out, const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x);
00030   
00031   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_hot inline static void apply_proxy (Mat<typename T1::elem_type>& out, const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x);
00032   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_hot inline static void apply_unwrap(Mat<typename T1::elem_type>& out, const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x);
00033     
00034   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_hot inline static void apply_inplace_plus (Mat<typename T1::elem_type>& out, const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x);
00035   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_hot inline static void apply_inplace_minus(Mat<typename T1::elem_type>& out, const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x);
00036   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_hot inline static void apply_inplace_schur(Mat<typename T1::elem_type>& out, const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x);
00037   template<typename T1, typename T2> arma_hot inline static void apply_inplace_div  (Mat<typename T1::elem_type>& out, const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& x);
00038   
00039   };
